Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Please transcribe but do not localize proper nouns.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
Female AI that helps the player
The player character, can be either male or female.
The player character, can be either male or female.
The player character, can be either male or female.
The player character, can be either male or female.
PUG is the name of in-game unit.

Shaped like a flower, this chip created by Fang Jiang enhances Tappels' jolly nature, and grants it the [abilityblue]High Morale Aura[/abilityblue], which increases the morale of friendly Biological or Cyborg units adjacent to Tappels by {TappelsHappinessBonus}.
Biological and Cyborg are in-game concepts.
This mod can only be equipped by Tappels.
Tappels is the name of the PUG.
Tappel's jolly nature increases the morale of adjacent friendly Biological or Cyborg units by {TappelsHappinessBonus}.
Tappels has received special care during construction.
The exact purpose of this device is unknownâ€¦
This unit was genetically modified to filter the toxic chemicals from the environment of Gardip XX. It gains [abilityblue]Spawn Forests[/abilityblue].
Gardip XX is the name of the planet
Gives the unit [abilityblue]Constant Reassembly[/abilityblue], granting the unit a {RegenHp} health regeneration.
This unit is considerably bigger and sturdier than others of its kind. It gains {GargantuanhealthBonus} and {GargantuanArmorBonus}.
This unit uses the abundant scrap pieces on Gardip XX to constantly reassemble itself. It regenerates {ConstantReassemblyhealthRegeneration} each turn in combat.
Generates a field that distorts reality around the unit, granting it universal camouflage. However, since the device is highly unstable, the unit needs to stay at very slow movement speed.
The Ambassador constantly plays the fine tunes created many years ago by 'Null Behavior', improving morale.
Null Behavior is the name of a band in the Star Union
The tunes of 'Null Behavior' seem to put the troops at ease, increasing the morale of adjacent friendly Biological or Cyborg units by {DatadiskHappinessBonus}.
Lohikarne is a demon from the Abyss
The wreckage of a crashed colony ship.
A shipwreck lies in the way of colonization efforts in this sector.
The ancient Pact of Souls gives Lohikarne's Echoes extreme longevity, allowing him to return from death after {Duration}[turn/] as long as any of his allies remain in combat.
The Whisper of Dissent brings insanity. Its attacks have a strength {InsanityCheck} chance to inflict Insanity for {InsanityDuration}.
The Whisper of Change brings a new wind. Its attacks have a strength {InstabilityCheck} chance to inflict Instability for {InstabilityDuration}.
The Whisper of Prosperity blesses those within its presence with strength. Friendly units in a {HaloRadius} hex radius gain {ProsperityHaloShields}.
The Whisper of Pride reinforces the pride of those it blesses. They gain [abilityblue]Absorb Pain[/abilityblue].
The Whisper of Perfection removes imperfections from its allies.
Bless the target with Perfection, dispelling all negative effects and healing the target for {BlessingOfPerfectionHeal}.

Dragan Voss' unique variant of the Alpha Strain grants him a stack of [abilityblue]Evolved Resilience[/abilityblue] permanently each time he suffers damage. [abilityblue]Evolved resilience[/abilityblue] grants: {Healthbonus} this effect stacks up to {HealthbonusStack} times
This unit gains a stack of [abilityblue]Evolved Resilience[/abilityblue] permanently each time it is damaged.

Dragan Voss' unique variant of the Alpha Strain grants him a stack of [abilityblue]Evolved Aggression[/abilityblue] permanently each time he kills an enemy unit. [abilityblue]Evolved aggression[/abilityblue] grants: {Aggressionbonus} damage, this effect stacks up to {AggressionBonusStack} times

Dragan Voss' Alpha Strain has grown to an exeptional strength. This unit has an {ParasiticInfectionStrength} chance to inflict [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred] with it's attacks and gains [abilityblue]Resurgence[/abilityblue]
